member.name: T:BattleField2.Renderers.ColorConfig
member.summary: This class holds some configuration details related to the color rendering in the application.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ColorConfig.SetColor(System.String)
member.summary: Method that sets the Console color based on given string.
member.param: String value representing a Color name to be parsed.
member.returns: New object of type ConsoleColor to be implemented as a new color setting by the console.

member.name: T:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer
member.summary: ConsoleGameRenderer class implements the IGameRenderer interface and provides most of the main methods that we use inside the GameEngine class.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.DisplayMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Method that gets a string and prints it as a message to the Console.
member.param: Message to be printed on the Console.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.Clear
member.summary: Method that clears the Console screen.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.EnterCommand
member.summary: Method that waits for a user input as a command and returns that command.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.DrawCell(System.String)
member.summary: Method that draw a given cell from the game field. We get the cell content as an input parameter and then evaluate what to print and with what color based on that content.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.DrawField(BattleField2.Models.Cells.Cell[0:,0:])
member.summary: Method that draws the whole game field.
member.param: Multi-dimensional array of Cell Objects that will build the game field.

member.name: M:BattleField2.Renderers.ConsoleGameRenderer.SetSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method that is used to set the size of the game field. NOTE: In case of unsupported width or height the game field size will be set to the maximum size for the current system Console.

member.name: T:BattleField2.Renderers.IGameRenderer
member.summary: IGameRenderer interface to be implemented and inherited.
